title: Telling people they're trolling = you get punished.
body:
Kinda at the point where I should just stop giving a shit about my rank and just ruin peoples games because clearly this Senna got the best of me as I'm the one who now has chat restrictions and she's the one who taxed mid lane all game. This game wants me to be low silver anyway.

Game 1
In-Game
River Singed: gg
River Singed: this bot lane
River Singed: thank our bot lane for this win
River Singed: senna
River Singed: do something

River Singed: ur laner

River Singed: GREAT FLASH

River Singed: i was out

River Singed: so glad we have a blitz for their hard engage comp

River Singed: focus vayne

River Singed: my bot lane

River Singed: you fed
River Singed: you're the reason we lost
River Singed: it's funny tho
River Singed: because
River Singed: ur vayne wasn't that good
Game 3
In-Game
River Singed: stay healthy

replies.body:
You didn't tell them they were trolling. You insulted, flamed and blamed your teammates.

You were not punished for "telling people they are trolling". You were suspended for being an asshole to other players.

And you cannot say with certainty they were trolling.
Wait, were you trolling or were they? Your chat looks like you were.

You deserve a ban for this kind of chat. You're the kind of player I insta-mute at 5 min in because you're a distraction and I refuse to hurt my team by responding to people like you. You will never rank up behaving this way. Ever.

> [{quoted}](name=River Singed,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WZcM3vMI,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2020-01-25T22:10:37.596+0000)
>
> You're the type of human that needs bubble wrap for everyday life.

You literally proved my point. NO worries, your behavior will catch up to you. 

You didn't get the validation you wanted as a troll so you are throwing a tantrum.

Too bad sweetheart.{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
Im pretty sure trolls know they're trolling. That's kind of the point. Pointing it out to them just gives them what they want: attention. It does nothing beneficial for the game.
You have toxic chat across multiple games, not for just yelling someone they're trolling. Play more. Type less.

They encourage trolling and purposely put people in those positions to cause it
They wanna van ur account so u make a back up and they get more money

Not sure why you are bouncing around to multiple threads to repeat an argument that is just conspiracy, but lets go ahead and entertain it.

If someone was punished for a reason they felt was unfair, why would they spend money on the game if they continued to play?

They also don't encourage trolling nor target specific people to match together in an attempt to get someone punished.

> [{quoted}](name=Imperial Pandaa,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WZcM3vMI,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2020-01-26T21:04:44.872+0000)
>
> Not sure why you are bouncing around to multiple threads to repeat an argument that is just conspiracy, but lets go ahead and entertain it.
> 
> If someone was punished for a reason they felt was unfair, why would they spend money on the game if they continued to play?
> 
> They also don't encourage trolling nor target specific people to match together in an attempt to get someone punished.

Taking bets that this won't get a response.

As the others said. It appears you wanted to show that you were justified, and it's too bad. I hope you understand and seek to improve how you deal with people, or as Gatekeeper said, refrain from using chat.
I'm going river singed for the rest of my league career
when you grow up some you'll realize that you're just wasting your own time

Take a shot every time OP says "troll"

{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

The fact that they removed my statement "You're the type of human that needs bubble wrap for everyday life." because it might be offensive is the perfect irony for how fragile this community is. Real life is gonna murder ya lol

> [{quoted}](name=River Singed,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WZcM3vMI,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2020-01-27T05:16:18.623+0000)
>
> The fact that they removed my statement "You're the type of human that needs bubble wrap for everyday life." because it might be offensive is the perfect irony for how fragile this community is. Real life is gonna murder ya lol

I'm always mildly confused about statements like this.

Are you not conversing with real people? The internet isn't on some foreign plane of existence. The rules are actually there, not just in someone else's mind. The things you do on the internet can have an effect on you outside of the internet as well (unless you're completely willing to ignore all the cases where people get in real trouble for the things that they do online).

Besides, following the rules of the establishment predates the internet. If you break the rules of a bar, store, someone's house, etc they can toss you out. They also get to make the rules, behavioral included, to follow in their establishment.

If you can't handle an establishment making/enforcing rules then maybe you should be concerned about how you're going to handle real life. Because you're going to have to deal with a lot of rules in a lot of places, often changing depending on the locale.

I had a good laugh at this part: "how to absolutely lose control of a game - a book by azir"

But honestly be thankful all you got for that was chat restrictions. I've been perma-banned on two different accounts (this one included) for flame about on par with yours there.
